snippet.title: Apex Rush - Official Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist now! - https://store.steampowered.com/app/2638250/Apex_Rush/

Here's the first official gameplay trailer for Apex Rush! 
Race, Drift & Stunt in this physics-based arcade racing game! Build and share your own tracks with the world and top the leaderboards!

Join the Discord for more game updates and release info!
https://discord.com/invite/XnCJXbG753

I'm very excited to release this one, got some work left to do before we head into early access so stay tuned, thank you all for the support on this game!

Music: informal. - DIY
